Hull Art Circle Summer Exhibition 2016

1—13 August 2016

Summer Exhibition from Hull Art Circle members, showcasing work from members in a wide range of styles and materials.

Princes Quay

Monday to Saturday,

Past Exhibitions

Barry Carter Paintings

9 July—21 August 2016

“My work is about the pleasure I feel at being in the landscape. I return again and again to my favourite places to take in the endless changes of mood and light.”
